article:
Confucius was born on August 27th,551 BC in Zou, China. He was _ great teacher at that time. Confucius is also _ as Kong Qiu. It is generally thought that he was born into a rich family. However, some people describe him as being born into a poor family.
Confucius' beliefs were based on the concept of self-discipline . He believed _ a leader need to exercise self-discipline. His teaching ideas focused on the "Six Art". To Confucius, the main goal of being a teacher was to teach people to live with honest. _ his teaching he made a big difference in that society.
Confucius is famous for writing. He wrote some of the most famous traditional Chinese works, one of _ is the Book of Odes (<<>> ). He also wrote a historical book of Lu, called the Spring and Autumn Annals (<<>> ). Confucius also _ Lunyu. It was so important in Chinese culture that everyone in China knew it.
Confucius died _ November 21st,479 BC in Qufu, China. Today he is widely regarded as one of the greatest teachers in Chinese history.
